website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a quick and simple smart plug for HomeKit, PureSwitch is just that.
pros: PureSwitch is simple to set up and includes a USB 2.0 charging port
cons: PureSwitch only works with Apple HomeKit and doesn't offer higher-end features like dimming options or energy tracking

customer_reviews.title: EXACTLY What I Wanted!
customer_reviews.text: This could not have been easier to set up and operate. It works great with Apple’s HomeKit. Now I have a bedroom lamp I can turn on and off without getting out of bed but also I can automate it to come on when I arrive home or at sunset. I’ll never have to walk into a dark house again. I’m so excited! Update: I added a second one to the living room lamp that’s always hard to reach. Adding it in was a breeze. It’s set up for the same automation - turn on when I arrive home between 4 and 11 pm. I can’t say enough good things about these!
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Happy wife, happy life
customer_reviews.text: Dream come true. My wife loves getting into a warm bed. But she needed a way to remotely turn on her electric blanket 1 hour before she got home. With a variable schedule, a simple timer would not suffice. Of course, the PureSwitch also has a simple timer to turn a light on/off the same time everyday. Now with the PureSwitch, my wife can remotely turn on her electric blanket on her way home and have a toasty warm bed waiting for her when she arrives. Happy wife, happy life!
customer_reviews.author: Lily Siao

customer_reviews.title: Save Your Money
customer_reviews.text: Unnecessarily complex to set up as a simple daily timer. Also, it’s highly unreliable. Set it up on my 2.4 GHz network but it only works if my iPad is also on the 2.4 GHz network. If I switch my iPad to the 5 GHz network, Pureswitch stops working. Overpriced and useless. UPDATE: Bought an Amazon Smart Plug which works flawlessly, integrates with Alexa, and is half the price. Don’t waste your money on Pureswitch.
customer_reviews.author: Ray V.

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds My Expectations!!!
customer_reviews.text: !Love this product! I can control virtually anything at home,lights, fans, tv's etc. with the app, from literally anywhere! It's a plug and play switch that's inexpensive and easy to use. I almost forgot, it also has a USB port for charging cell phones, iPads, laptops...multiple rooms can be added if you have other devices in other rooms. PureSwitch is the real deal!!👍🏾
customer_reviews.author: Allister Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install with clear instructions
customer_reviews.text: *The product arrived on time and is exactly as pictured. *Easy to install with clear instructions. *Customizable to meet personal demands like turning on the light at night or when you arrive home. *Syncs not only to App but also to Apple Home (yay iPhone users!) I am using several around the house for a couple of months and have no complaints! I also used the smart switches for the Christmas tree and Christmas lights and they definitely make the holidays a little easier!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chose another brand
customer_reviews.text: Bought several different brands as I integrated light automation....three of these stopped staying logged on to my mesh WiFi after a year...despite many reboots they fall off the network and say not responding in a few hours...they went to the trash
customer_reviews.author: CDM G

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Great product at good price. Setup was super easy and integrates with Apple HHome kit with ease. Love this smart product and has lots of advance features, I will definitely buy a few more for the house.

customer_reviews.title: Works Good
customer_reviews.text: The switch works as advertised, I’ve had no issues. I give it 3 stars because it’s HomeKit only, it would be nice if it worked with other services.

customer_reviews.title: Super Convenient
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great, never had a single problem with it. Pairs great with HomeKit with zero issues.

customer_reviews.title: Nope

customer_reviews.text: It worked. Sometimes. It would often require restarting, plugging it back in, and resetting. We ended up returning after a few days because it stopped responding at all.

customer_reviews.text: Could be my house, but this socket wouldn't stay synced (sp?) to my Apple Home. Returned it no problem.

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality and functional product!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one, really impressed with it. Works perfectly as described, easy set up, feels like a great quality product, many useful functions, going to get a few more. Fast shipping, good service.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is very easy to setup. Extremely reliable. It works so good, I bought a second one.

customer_reviews.title: Another Smart Idea
customer_reviews.text: Compatible with Smart Home app .. I set it and forget it...turns my lamps on and off just when I need them to. Excellent for the absent minded.
customer_reviews.author: Mary J

customer_reviews.title: Workable but the app is not updated for a long time and the support is unacceptable.
customer_reviews.text: It works fine but sometimes it lost connection to home app. Don’t expect to get any support as I sent an email to ask how to get the firmware update to the customer support but no response.
customer_reviews.author: Morey Chang

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for those looking for HomeKit devices
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Slowly transitioning lights fans lamps and switches through the house to Apple HomeKit - this has a very stable connection. Always works, responds quickly through Siri voice commands and was easy to set up. I have two so far.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: The PureSwitch is very easy to set it up and running
customer_reviews.text: The PureSwitch is very easy to set up and running! It' not only has the regular power plug but also has an USB plug for you to pylug in USB devices! Absolutely love it, going to buy few more for my home! It works with Apple HomeKit flawlessly!
customer_reviews.author: Chinping Chang

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing: It can't do simple sunset/sunrise schedules
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed. It can't do sunset timing, so it's not useful for light timing to make a home look lived in; you'd have to adjust the timing at least monthly all year long. Strange, as sunset/sunrise timing is always available on the web for any location in the world (Google, for example). Light timing is the only use I have for this thing, so . . . now what? Back to simple photocell timers without wifi, I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Twardowski

customer_reviews.title: NEEDS DESIGN WORK - FRUSTRATING
customer_reviews.text: Connected this via my Xfinity Wifi using their app and Homekit. All went well at first as it was easy to configure and worked as expected. However, Xfinity service does a restart to update a few times per week. Every time this happened, the plug would not reconnect when the wifi connection restarted. I would have to unplug the smart plug, plug it back in and wait for it to cycle on. then a day or two later, same thing. NOT READY FOR PRIME TIME!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Cardoza

customer_reviews.title: Becomes unresponsive after 7 mins!
customer_reviews.text: I actually won a Pure Switch on-line early Jan 2018. I had no real use for it until recently, so I decided to finally put it to use. After the wi-fi setup and adding the switch to my Home app, I discovered that the switch would become unresponsive after a time. I moved the unit closer thinking that I had originally was too far from my router. Even 10 ft away (unobstructed and with a strong wi-if signal) I have timed the drop in connection to 7 mins or so - rendering this device completely useless to me. Going with a Hue device as I already have a number of lights and a hub.
customer_reviews.author: Ed_D

customer_reviews.title: Product is unreliable and pricey, warranty is poorly executed.
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for 2 months than lost conection to home network At first siri said i don’t see that item in your network. Then after reloading in home kit and the pure gear app and restarting the router, ipad, apple tv and switch the complaint was that item is not responding. Called pure gear and they’re sending a new unit with a fee of $6.95...(what kind of warranty requires a fee??) After this experience, i’ll be avoiding PureGear products.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

product_meta.title: PureGear PureSwitch Wireless Wi-Fi Smart Plug Electrical Outlet Switch, 2-in-1 Plug, and USB Charging Port, Timer, No Hub Required, Remote Access with Apple HomeKit, HomePod, Siri for iOS 8.1 or later
feature_bullets: Remotely switch household appliances ON/OFF anywhere using your iPhone., iPad., or iPod touch.. Features Apple HomeKit technology which provides an easy and secure way to control your accessories.

Free PureSwitch. app lets you create custom scenes to control one or multiple appliances from different zones with one single tap. Create Zones for the basement, downstairs, upstairs, etc. and Rules to turn scenes ON/OFF according to your schedule
You can also control your PureSwitch by using Siri from your iPhone., iPad., or iPod touch.
2-in-1 plug with built-in USB charging port. Output USB: 5VDC/2.1A. For indoor use only.
